priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C106653

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia Test Code Terminology

definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory Severe Dementia Version test code.
name: QS-Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory Severe Dementia Version Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia Test Code Terminology
synonyms: QS-Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory Severe Dementia Version Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding eating, which best describes {S} usual performance during the last 4 weeks?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Eating

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding walking (or getting around in a wheelchair) in the past 4 weeks, which best describes {S} optimal performance?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Optimal Performance of Walking

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding bowel and bladder function at the toilet, which best describes {S} usual performance during the past 4 weeks?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Usual Bowel and Bladder Function at Toilet

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding bathing, in the past 4 weeks, which best describes {S} usual performance?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Bathing

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding grooming, in the past 4 weeks, which best describes {S} optimal performance?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Optimal Performance of Grooming

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding physically getting dressed, which best describes {S} usual performance in the past 4 weeks?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Physically Getting Dressed

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} use a telephone?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Use a Telephone

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes {S} highest level of performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Highest Performance of Telephone Use

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} watch television?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Watch Television

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Did {S} usually select or ask for different programs or {S} favorite show?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Select or Ask for Television Program

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Did {S} usually talk about the content of a program while watching it?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Talk About TV Content While Watching
synonyms: ADL02-Talk About TV Content While Watch

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Did {S} talk about the content of a program within a day (24 hours) after watching it?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Talk About TV Content Within a Day After Watching
synonyms: ADL02-Talk About TV Content Within a Day

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} ever appear to pay attention to conversation or small talk for at least 5 minutes?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Pay Attention to Conversation

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes {S} usual degree of participation.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Usual Conversation Participation

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Did {S} clear the dishes from the table after a meal or snack?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Clear Dishes After Meal or Snack

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes how {S} usually performed.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Clearing Dishes

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually manage to find his/her personal belongings at home?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Find Personal Belongings at Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes how {S} usually performed.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Finding Personal Belonging at Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} obtain a hot or cold beverage for him/herself?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Obtain Beverage for Self

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes {S} highest level of performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Highest Performance of Obtaining Beverage

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} dispose of garbage or litter in an appropriate place or container at home?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Dispose of Garbage in Appropriate Place at Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes how {S} usually performed.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Garbage Disposal

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} get around (or travel) outside of his/her home?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Get Around Outside Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes {S} optimal performance.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Optimal Performance of Getting Around Outside of Home

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, was {S} ever left on his/her own?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Subject Left on Their Own

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Was {S} left: away from home for 15 minutes or longer, during the day?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Alone Away From Home for Fifteen Minutes or Longer

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Was {S} left: at home for an hour or longer during the day?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Alone at Home for One Hour or Longer
synonyms: ADL02-Left at Home for 1 Hour or Longer

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Was {S} left: at home for less than 1 hour during the day?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Alone at Home for Less Than One Hour
synonyms: ADL02-Left at Home for Less Than 1 Hour

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually run water from a faucet to wash {S} hands or face without help?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Turn On Faucet to Wash Without Help

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually turn off the faucet after finishing running water without help?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Turn Off Faucet After Wash Without Help

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually turn on a light without help when entering a dark room or area?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Turn On Light Without Help Entering Room

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually turn off lights without help when leaving a room or going to sleep?
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Turn Off Light Without Help Leaving Room

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Sum of Items 1-5.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Sum of Items 1-5

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Sum of Items 6-8.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Sum of Items 6-8

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Sum of Items 9-12.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Sum of Items 9-12

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Sum of Items 13-15.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Sum of Items 13-15

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Sum of Items 16-19.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Sum of Items 16-19

terms.definition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Total Score.
terms.preferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Total Score
